OOC: Wow....Hell Beast gets killed in that weird psyco dream...and now the 
Militrons are coming to get me! Someone really dosent like me up there!

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Winter. Hell Beast hated the season of white death as much as he hated 
the Maximals. The white shroud would envelop the valley, and that was not 
good news for any Predacon, be they in the Predacons, Newcomers, or Megatrons 
little group. With the dark colored armor the predacons had, they would surly 
stick out in the whiteness of nature in the next few months. And, the snow 
was beginning to fall. :::

::: Hell Beast, his breath visable, turned to adress his crew ::: Predacons, 
it is with deep remorse that I must say we are in Winter. It is going to be 
alot harder for us, because of our armor color. But I think we will endure 
whatever comes our way.

::: Gremlin ::: Yes, but we failed at the destruction of the Ark.

::: Hell Beast :: No, if we had destroyed it the Autobots would have lost the 
war. The Decepticons would then rule the Galaxy, and Predacons would have 
never been created.

::: Transanulas ::: Those sound like the words of a traitor.

::: Hell Beast ::: Youre one to talk about traitors, achacnid. 

::: Transanulas looked down and said nothing. The other predacons listened. 
:::

::: Black Aracnia ::: So, what do we do now?

::: Hell Beast ::: We continue as we did before. Nothing changes.

::: Marine, in the back holding a sack, ::: Do you want the materials we 
salvaged from the maximal base?

::: Hell Beast nodded. Marine spilled the contents onto a table. They were 
nothing really they could use at all. But Hell Beast commended Maine for his 
intuition to get them. :::

::: Hell Beast turned to look out the window, the meeting was at an end. All 
the Predacons returned to there posts, except for Jackle and Inferno who went 
out on a perimiter patrol. :::

::: Standing there, thinking about Vuloris, Battera, Megatron, Koga Shuko. 
...Hell Beast sighed. Things would get better. After all, his fraction was 
the biggest and most powerful in the Beast Wars. :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Pheniox, bring Rat Trap up here. I have an idea.

::: pheniox nodded, and after a brief pause she brought the vermine to the 
bridge. ::

::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, Rat Trap. Looking well.

::: Rat Trap ::: Ah, can it Hell Beast! You havent fed me in days!

::: Hell Beast ::: Yes, well....can you blame me?

::: Rat Trap ::: Yeah, for alot of stuff!

::: Hell Beast smiled ::: I have a job for you. If you refuse, you will die. 
If you accept, I will grant you your freedom. Clear?

::: Rat Trap ::: Im listening...

::: Hell Beast ::: Excellent.
